fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture, Education and training, Enlargement, Energy, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: ISS is mainly interested in the fields: H2020, Public Health Programme, EURATOM, EMA policy, ECDC surveillance system, EFSA, ECHA.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
membership:
Member of ERIC-EATRIS 
Member of ERIC-BBMRI 
Member of ERIC-ECRIN
goals__remit: The Istituto Superiore di Sanità (ISS) is the Italian National Institute of Public Health, carrying out scientific-technical Research for the Italian National Health System, providing control and advice in Public Health. Its role within the Italian Health System is to promote Public Health through scientific Research, surveys, and interventions in different fields of Health sciencies which include communicable and non-communicable diseases, environment, food and drugs.
